column3: str

Maru looks genuinely worried.

※Please note that the difficulty of this quest has been synced to your current level. Furthermore, you may not proceed with a class or job that is different from when you accepted this quest.
Search for the missing Rider.
Retrieve the fallen cargo.
Return the fallen cargo within the time limit.
Report back to Maru.
We might have trouble, <Split(<Highlight>ObjectParameter(1)</Highlight>, ,1)/>─one of our Riders has gone missin'.
Last we heard from him, he was headin' back here from Palaka's Stand, but that was some time ago.
You think you could spare a moment to join our search? We've covered the ground between here and the Wakeful Torana so far, but beyond that...
Oh, blessed be! Someone came lookin'!
You won't believe the beast we just ran into. Ugliest thing I've seen since the Final Days...
Well, we spanked away like our skins depended on it, but my delivery got jostled outta the cart.
To make matters worse, when I pull 'round to fetch it, my wheel slams into a rock, an' now I'm spinnin' six ways to nowhere!
My girl was in hippo hysterics─I had to cut her loose to stop her bellowin'. I hate to put you out like this, but you think you could lend me a hand an' bring me my cargo?
It's just one wooden crate. I think I spotted it by that boulder over there.
Shapin' up to be one of those days, I'm afraid─but knowin' that cargo's safe would make all the difference.
Return the fallen cargo to the harried Rider's cart before your arms give out.
You will have three minutes to complete the task. Should you fail, return to the starting location and begin anew.
That's it! Thank the Sisters. And you!
I'll head home as soon as we're ready to ride. Let Maru know we're alright, will you?
I've still gotta check the cart an' coax my girl back under the yoke─tell Maru we'll be on our way shortly, yeah?
So that's what happened! Thank the Sisters that everyone's alright...
Our Riders are usually pretty good at avoidin' the nastier beasties, but a jungle's still a jungle... Sounds like our carts could use some adjustments, too...
Anyroad, I'll mention it to the boss. Thanks for bein' a pal, <Split(<Highlight>ObjectParameter(1)</Highlight>, ,1)/>.
